ygData.subject: Re: Al's frost spiral...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It s an AE spell which means that it can damage several mobs at once. Only use it when your tank has a few monsters on him.  The mana cost is higher but
ygData.messageBody:
> I just obtained 12th level and was wondering if it would be
> worth it to get
> Al'Kabor's Frost Spiral? I have seen the mana cost at 100!
> and I have never
> seen a damage code for it.... Any one want to help me on
> this one?

It's an AE spell which means that it can damage several mobs at once.
Only use it when your tank has a few monsters on him. The mana cost
is higher but since it can damage several mobs at once, it's a good
deal if you use it in the right situations. It's a good thing to
always have one AE spell loaded in case you get swarmed by mobs. I
usually have one AE, one Shock and one Bolt spell in my top three
slots.

Aznyin
Level 17 Erudite Wizard
Chivalric Order of Norrath
Current Residence: Rivervale [Solusek Ro]
